廱字的基本解释

廱
yōng
和谐；和乐。
古通“壅”，堵塞：“廱河三日不流。”

廱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yōng］
［《廣韻》於容切，平鍾，影。］
亦作“1”。
(1)和乐。参见“廱廱”。
(2)通“壅”。阻塞。

廱字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【广字部】　廱； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页352第19
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於容切，音雝。【爾雅·釋訓】廱廱，和也。　又辟廱，學名。【說文】天子饗飮辟廱。【廣韻】辟廱，天子敎宮。【詩·大雅】於樂辟廱。【傳】水旋丘如璧，曰辟廱。【白虎通】辟廱，四面如璧，水雝之，在南方七里之內，立明堂於中。月令論曰：取其宗廟之淸，則曰淸廟。取其正室之貌，則曰太廟。取其堂，則曰明堂。取其四門之學，則曰太學。取其水周圓璧，則曰辟廱。【三輔黃圖】璧廱如璧之圓，廱之以水，象敎化流行也。　又【集韻】通作雝。【詩·周頌】于彼西雝。　又通作雍。【前漢·河閒獻王傳】對三雍宮。【註】應劭曰：辟雍，靈臺，明堂也。雍，和也。言天地君臣人民皆和也。　又茨，一名雞廱。【莊子·庚桑楚】雞廱也，豕零也。　又雍縣。亦作廱。【前漢·百官表】廱，太宰太祝令丞。【註】師古曰：五畤在廱，故特設太宰以下諸官。　又【集韻】與壅通。【前漢·五行志】成公五年，梁山崩，廱河三日不流。【註】師古曰：廱，讀曰雍。◎按《穀梁傳》本作壅。

廱字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
廱字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
toning
yōng
Harmony; Harmony.
Gutong "blocked" and blocked: "The river will not flow for three days."
toning
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yōng］
["Guangyun" Yu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Ying. ]
Also known as "1".
(1) Harmony. See "廱廱".
(2) Through "choice". block.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [Guang Zi Department] 　廱; Kangxi strokes: 21; Page number: page 352 19
[Guang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. [Erya·Shixun] 廱廱, and also.　 Also Piqu, scientific name. 【Said the text】The emperor feasts on the sacred scorpion. [Guang Yun] Piqi, the emperor's palace. [Poetry·Daya] Yu Le Piqu. 【Biography】Shuixuanqiu is like Bi, and said Piqiu. 【Baihutong】Ping 廱, on all sides like a wall, the water is Yongzhi, within seven miles of the south, there is a Mingtang in the middle. Yueling Lun said: Take the name of its ancestral temple, and then call it the temple. Take the appearance of the main room, it is called Taimiao. Whichever hall is chosen, it is called Mingtang. Taking the four schools of study, it is called Taixue. Take the water circle and round bi, then it is called Piqu. 【Three auxiliary yellow pictures】Bibi is like the circle of bibi, and water is used for it, which is also popular.　 [Ji Yun] Tong Zuo Yong. [Poem·Zhou Song] Yu Bixi Yong.　Through again as Yong. [Previous Han·Hexian Xian Wang Biography] To the Three Lama Temple. [Note] Ying Shao said: Piyong, Lingtai, Mingtang. Yong, and also. It is said that the people of heaven and earth are harmonious.　 You Ci, a cock. [Zhuangzi·Geng Sangchu] The chickens are also, and the pigs are zero.　Yong County. Also used as 廱. [Former Han·Hundred Officials List], Dazai Taizhu Lingcheng. [Note] Shigu said: The five pieces are in the corner, so the officials below Dazai are specially set up.　[Jiyun] and choke. [Previous Han·Five Elements] Five years as a father, Liangshan collapsed and the Qihe River did not flow for three days. [Note] Shigu said: 廱, read yong. ◎According to the "Guliang Biography", this work is stuck.
